definition: to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity
lower form of animal life, including insects, insect larvae, worms and similar creatures/CL:條|条[tiao2],隻|只[zhi1]/(fig.) person with a particular undesirable characteristic

sentences.english: Buzzing insects will infest all your trees and the crops of your soil.
sentences.chinese: 害蟲要吃盡你所有的樹木和土地的出產。

sentences.english: Pink Scavenger caterpillar ( Pyroderces rileyi Walsingham ) is a species of storage moth pests, which has not been reported in China before.
sentences.chinese: 玉米尖翅蛾是國內尚未見報道的一種蛾類倉庫害蟲。

sentences.english: The geometrid Apocheima sp. is one of the worst pest of the locust tree in Mei County.
sentences.chinese: 刺槐尺蠖是陝西省眉縣地區刺槐林的主要害蟲。

sentences.english: The yellow tortrix, Acleris fimbriana is an economically important orchard insect in northern Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 黃斑長翅卷蛾是我國北方果園的重要害蟲。

sentences.english: Brown planthopper , Nilaparvata lugens and white back planthopper , Sogatella furcifera are two kinds of major rice pests in Asia.
sentences.chinese: 褐飛蝨與白背飛蝨是亞洲稻區的兩種重要害蟲。

sentences.english: This new insecticide kills out most of the pests.
sentences.chinese: 這種新殺蟲劑消滅了大部分害蟲。

sentences.english: Parasitoids is an important factor in regulating insect population dunamics.
sentences.chinese: 寄生蜂是調節寄主害蟲種羣數量的一個重要因子。

sentences.english: Damage caused by tree borers will be still serious.
sentences.chinese: 楊樹蛀幹害蟲的危害仍然嚴重。

sentences.english: The beet webworm, Loxostege sticticalis Linnaeus (Lepidoptera: Pyralidae), is a serious pest to farming and stockbreeding in Northern China.
sentences.chinese: 草地螟是一種兼具遷飛和滯育特性的重要農業害蟲。

sentences.english: Insects which eat crops are pests.
The peach fruit moth, Carposina sasakii Mstsumura, is a major fruit-boring insect pest of apples, peaches and pears etc. in China.
sentences.chinese: 桃小食心蟲是我國果樹上主要的蛀果害蟲。

sentences.english: Sitobion avenae(Fabricius)is a serious pest of wheat in China.
sentences.chinese: 麥長管蚜是我國小麥的重要害蟲之一。

sentences.english: Mango weevils is a main pest attacking mango in the tropical region.
sentences.chinese: 芒果象甲是危害芒果的重要害蟲之一。

sentences.english: Athetis lepigone is a new insect pest in seedling stage of summer corn in China, and causes serious damage.
sentences.chinese: 二點委夜蛾是我國夏玉米苗期的新害蟲，危害性極強。

sentences.english: Aphrodisium faldermannii rufiventris Gressitt is an important pest of broadleaf trees.
sentences.chinese: 紅腹柄天牛是闊葉樹的重要害蟲之一。

definition: to hunt and kill (an animal or fish)
imago (adult, sexually mature insect, the final stage of its development)
giant Amazon snail (Ampullaria gigas spix), that has devastated rice paddies in China since its introduction in the 1980s
